claim_text: Radoss positions itself as the nexus of business, marketing, and technology for integrated growth execution.
The updated portfolio documents 9 case-study streams including Gerocare, Halogen Security, Eatalia, Healthtracka, Zenith, Miva, Bracken, and HippoAds.
Mandilas public channels indicate heritage operations and multi-sector presence across mobility and engineering touchpoints.
Toyota Nigeria dealer listing confirms Mandilas service operations in Lagos touchpoints.
DataReportal 2025 Nigeria reports 150M mobile connections, 107M internet users, and 38.7M social media identities.
World Bank latest Nigeria macro snapshot: urban population 63.0% (2024), inflation 33.2% (2024), GDP growth 4.1% (2024).
GSMA SSA mobile economy highlights persistent usage gap and continuing 4G/5G adoption trajectory.
Deloitte and PwC consumer/automotive studies indicate stronger demand for digital research, transparent pricing, and frictionless purchase/service journeys.
